choices: ...deny the challenge, at least for now.
1.content:
You are a dragon again. You're hanging out with your friend, who is also a dragon named Xander.

Xander: Hey, may I ask you a question?

You: Yeah, what?

Xander: Can I hypnotize you?

You: ...Wha?

Xander: I found this pocket watch thingy, and I wanna try it out.

You decide to...
1.title: Challenge

choices: Lyth "I believe she might give me a great insight."
Terra "Hypnosis book... She's bound to know something."
Breeze "Relaxation & Tranquility is a big key to hypnosis, He's the one to see."
Amber "Shy & Quiet, usually are the ones to look out for, but I'll see her."
Rest of the Options: Cylo, Jewel, Krystal or Xander
12.content:
You: "No, I think I'll pass."

Xander: "Oh come on...."

You: "I said, No!"

Xander: "Please? Oh Please? Oh Please? Oh Please?" Xander pleaded with puppy eyes.

You: "Why?"

Xander: "Why what?"

You: "Why do you want to hypnotize me?"

Xander: "Because of how cool it looks, and think about it, someone who's open to your
every suggestion." Xander put emphasis on suggestion.

You: "Can you let me think about it?" You asked with a hint of interest in your voice.

Xander: "Yeah, if you're interested here's a couple of places where I've seen dragons who know about hypnosis, but I'll be home if you want to be hypnotized by me." He said with a wink, Xander hands you a list of various dragons along with, where they're located.

You: "Alright thanks. See you later." You wave goodbye,

While you're walking, you look up to see it's still the afternoon, you pull out the list and read:

Xander's List and Descriptions on sources of Hypnosis

1. Lyth's Magic and Illusions Shop - Lyth is a blue female dragon, who enjoys tricking the mind with magic, although her knowledge on hypnosis is unknown. She is also quite friendly, and befriends any dragon who goes in to her shop, which is just about everyone. (Blue & Light Blue Female Dragon)

2. Terra's Home - She frequently visit's the magic shop, and usually is seen in the forest or at home, but once I caught her with a hypnosis book my suspicions were confirmed, she loves hypnosis. (Green & Dark Green Female Dragon)

3. Breeze - Hypnosis fits his personality, but its also a long shot. He once told me, he loves putting his feet in the river and feeling the water rush in between his toes, as it sends a relaxing feeling through out his body especially his toes. So he will be in the forest near the river or in his home, not too far from the river. Also is friends with Amber. (Yellow & Orange Male Dragon)

4. Amber - A rather shy dragon who's very close friends with Breeze, so I'm not sure if she knows anything about Hypnosis, but is suspicious behavior and fits just like Breeze. Amber is everywhere, but the place she is always seen is the Dragon Library. (Pink & Light Blue Female Dragon)

5. Cylo - Hypnosis is questionable with him and very likely, not only that, but he's a very kind dragon if you give him time. Usually is seen in the mountains, as he created a cave he calls home. (Purple & Blue Male Dragon)

6.Jewel - She has a fascination for shiny and beautiful objects, but never thought if she knows hypnosis. In fact, I don't think she does, but you never know until you see her. Can be found in the underground crystal caves, where she always is. (Red & Blue Female Dragon)

7.Krystal - A beautiful Dragon who is very adventurous and daring, she's been places and is rather fond of every dragon she meets. In fact, hypnosis was one of the first things she mentioned when I spoke with her and never hypnotized anyone, and is looking for some dragon to hypnotize. She can be found not too far from Dilex's home. (Golden Yellow & Light Blue Female Dragon)

8. Xander (Me) - Of course I'm a dragon that loves hypnosis and wish to try it out on Dilex... if he lets me. You can find me hanging out with Dilex at his home or mine. (Red & Orange Male Dragon)

P.S. If I've given this to some dragon, I recommend you watch out, as you are now treading on unknown soil.

You: "Well this is a very informative list & I like how he put himself in the list, as if he was going to give this to some dragon." You read, as it seemed quite odd.

You: "So many choices, Let's go see...."
12.title: "Why do you want to hypnotize me?"

choices: Basement "Not an ideal place, but now is good."
Forest "I can wait and the forest is a nice place to meet."
Lyth's Home "Your home sounds comfortable, I'll meet you there."
121.content:
You stand at the front of the shop, staring at the neon lighting that read 'Lyth's Magic & Illusion's Shop' You take a deep breath and enter the shop, as you enter you hear the ringing of a bell alarming Lyth of your presence. You look around to see no one behind the counter, but you can't help to take a look around seeing all the magical tricks and illusions before your eyes. You get so lost in the magical world that you completely forget why you're there, then suddenly...

Lyth: "May I help you..." Lyth said as she stretched the last part.

You: "Delix, my name is Delix."

Lyth: "I like that name, Delix, now what can I help you with Delix?"

You: "I'm wondering if you could show me something on..."

Lyth: "Card tricks, wing removal, invisibility tricks, illusions, impossible riddles...." She stared trying to guess what was on your mind.

You: "Hypnosis." You replied in a worried tone.

Lyth only gazed at you, she slowly walked around the counter in your direction, but walked passed you to the door and locked it. After doing so, she flipped the sign to close and shut the curtains. Lyth, then turned around and looked at you and spoke.

Lyth: "Hypnosis, you say a lot with that one word." A slight smile appeared on her face.

You: "I didn't mean to offend or...."

Lyth: "Hahahahaha!!!! You should of seen the look on your face, you looked so scared. I'm only kidding, now when hypnosis is said I usually keep that a private manner and let no other dragon see or hear."

You: "Well, in that case I...."

Lyth: "No, no, no, no... this is a private manner for all dragons and I can only discuss this in private settings. So where do want to meet and when?"

You: "I'm not sure. Do you have any recommendations?"

Lyth: "Okay, here's what we will do. We can meet in the basement right now, meet in the forest after I get off work, or meet me at my home? What do you say?"

You: "How about...."
121.title: Lyth's & Delix's Plan to Meet

choices: Cyclo "I'll never know, unless I talk to him."
Jewel "Fascination with objects, she could be the one I'm looking for."
Rest of the Choices: Krystal & Xander
125.content:
Rest of the Choices from the Previous Chapter.

5. Cylo - Hypnosis is questionable with him and very likely, not only that, but he's a very kind dragon if you give him time. Usually is seen in the mountains, as he created a cave he calls home. (Purple & Blue Male Dragon)

6. Jewel - She has a fascination for shiny and beautiful objects, but never thought if she knows hypnosis. In fact, I don't think she does, but you never know until you see her. Can be found in the underground crystal caves, where she always is. (Red & Blue Female Dragon)

7.Krystal - A beautiful Dragon who is very adventurous and daring, she's been places and is rather fond of every dragon she meets. In fact, hypnosis was one of the first things she mentioned when I spoke with her and never hypnotized anyone, and is looking for some dragon to hypnotize. She can be found not too far from Dilex's home. (Golden Yellow & Light Blue Female Dragon)

8. Xander (Me) - Of course I'm a dragon that loves hypnosis and wish to try it out on Dilex... if he lets me. You can find me hanging out with Dilex at his home or mine. (Red & Orange Male Dragon)
125.title: Options: Cylo, Jewel, Krystal or Xander

choices: Krystal "Looking for a hypnosis subject, I'll go see this dragon."
Xander "He's my friend, I can trust him, I'll let him hypnotize me."

info.brief_description: Delix the Dragon is turned into a slave. What will become of him?
info.description:
You are a dragon; in fact, the same one from my previous story, Dilex.

This story features my other interest/fetish, hypnotism.

PLEASE do not have any 18+ material. Simple enough.
